Question
========

Below is a partially completed ANOVA table.

  -------- ---- ---- ---- --- Source df SS MS F Groups 3 Error 25 20 Total 28 35 -------- ---- ---- ---- ---

Given a significance level of 0.05. Then it follows from the table that

Answerlist
----------

* 4 ≤ F ≤ 5 and so the null hypothesis of ANOVA can be rejected.
* 6 ≤ F ≤ 7 and so the null hypothesis of ANOVA can be rejected.
* F ≤ 2 and so the null hypothesis of ANOVA cannot be rejected.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 4 ≤ F ≤ 5 and thus the null hypothesis of ANOVA can be rejected...: Incorrect
* 6 ≤ F ≤ 7 and thus the null hypothesis of ANOVA can be rejected: Correct
* F ≤ 2 and so the null hypothesis of ANOVA cannot be rejected: Incorrect
